resources.string:
Play activity: 
Press the 'Play' button to begin playing the activity. 
 
Network settings: 
You may choose whether to download new exercises only when connected to Wi-Fi or when connected to another network. To change these settings, select 'Network Settings' from the options menu. 
 
Check for new exercises: 
To connect to the network and download new exercises, select 'Check for New Exercises' in the options menu. 
 
Change server: 
To change the path of the server that is being used to download new activities, select 'Change Server' from the options menu.

Click on one of the games in the list to begin playing the activity
 
If no games appear in the list, return to the home screen and in the options menu, select 'Check for New Exercises'
 
Good Luck!
